welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shimokodanaka, a charming city known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in the city's beauty and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, with domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Haneda Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is primarily used for domestic flights, but also has some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
